GSD.product_version: versions from v3.7 to before v4.14.276
GSD.description:
media: stk1160: If start stream fails, return buffers with VB2_BUF_STATE_QUEUED

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.276 by commit 03054f22d5abd80ad89547512c2bfbfb2714d3ed, it was introduced in version v3.7 by commit 8ac456495a33d9466076fea94594181ceefb76d9. For more details please see the references link.
